channel.title: How do i add items into shops?
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]dose any one know how to make it so i can set the prices of items in a shop? and how do make it so they appear in a shop?[/glow] :confused:
[glow=green,2,300][shadow=red,left]thx for reading ...and if u helped me..thx for helping :D[/shadow][/glow]

item.title: How do i add items into shops?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

Open shops.cfg and edit it to whatever you want like : (ID) 4151 (Amount) 10

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add items into shops?

item.title: How do i add items into shops?
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

Go get some tutorials , and also search in client.java , open shop.cfg and read the thing at the top.
